text: Genghis Khan is a 1965 British West German Serbian American adventure movie directed by Henry Levin and starring Omar Sharif, Stephen Boyd, James Mason, Eli Wallach, Françoise Dorléac, Telly Savalas, Robert Morley, Yvonne Mitchell, Woody Strode, Kenneth Cope. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1965 adventure movies Category:British adventure movies Category:German adventure movies Category:Serbian movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies directed by Henry Levin
title: Genghis Khan (1965 movie)
